task: How to Celebrate the Winter Solstice
step: Research the time of winter solstice, as well as the occurrences.
Understand the religious, magical and natural significance of winter solstice.
Make some solstice-themed traditional crafts, such as a Yule log.

task: How to Visit the September 11th Memorial Museum
step: Purchase tickets online ahead of your visit.
Spend some time paying your respects at the two reflecting pool memorials.
Enter the museum after passing a through security screening.
Explore the exhibits and displays on the basement level.
Proceed one level up to the main exhibition hall.
Visit the museum store on your way to the exit.

task: How to Celebrate Women's History Month
step: Look for women’s history events in your area.
Visit your local museum to check out a gallery exhibit.
Attend lectures about women in history or women’s issues.
Organize a women’s history event in your community.
